name: The Dwog
description:
#LDJam #LDJam35 #Unity

Hey everyone! I was actually meaning to compete in the Compo this time... but due to poor planning and just unable to focus this weekend, I will now be in the Jam! :D All Models, textures, scripts, animations, etc have been done by me alone. I did almost all the audio except the background music, as time ran out, and I'm submitting into the Jam, I went with an old favorite :P Enjoy!!! :D


You play an alien creature, similar to a dog in may aspects, except!!! He can shapeshift into any object he licks!!! I present to you, the Dwog! Solve your way through the maze, as Agents try to catch you. Find your way to your next meal, and win! :D
